synopsis.text:
Music video for the captivating track "Session Highâ¤´" by the fictional band Irodorimidori, a beloved creation of Sega's Chunithm rhythm arcade game, takes center stage. This remarkable tune marks the 20th and 22nd entry in the Irodorimidori series, showcasing the band's undeniable talent and staying power.

In a separate narrative, the brilliant violinist Nachi Tsukisuzu faces a dire academic predicament. Despite her world-class musical prowess, her scholastic performance leaves much to be desired. With supplementary classes looming and graduation on the line, Nachi's dedicated bandmates rally to her side. Together, they strive to help her overcome her academic struggles and secure her diploma.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
